user_input:
Create a commercial for creative ad for our company to help get the brand some attention. 
        Style: Cinematic, 3D Render. 
        Mood: Premium. 
        Camera: Steadicam, Static, Crane. 
        Target platform: YouTube TV. 
        Duration: 15s. 
        URL: https://botspot.trade/.
error: Assembly failed: No video clips available for assembly. All video generation failed.

lines.speaker: Narrator
lines.text: While the market never sleeps, your BotSpot AI is always awake, turning market complexities into opportunities for your financial goals.

scenes.visual_prompt: Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4. Heavy halation bloom on digital interface elements, chromatic aberration on edge highlights. 35mm Kodak 2383 print emulation with pronounced grain structure at ISO 2500. Sensor noise visible in shadow areas. All 3D renders treated with lens breathing artifacts and subtle focus hunting to break the 'too perfect' CGI look. A vast, sleeping cityscape of abstract, glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. Dominant colors are muted greys and blues, with intermittent, chaotic flashes of red and green data, centered in the safe zone. Extreme wide shot (EWS), a high-angle, slow and deliberate crane descent, revealing the immense scale of the dormant financial data landscape, ending in a static lock-off. Dramatic low-key lighting with practical sources within the data streams creating subtle glows and reflections, volumetric haze adding depth, deep blacks, and controlled highlights. Desaturated palette with selective, muted teal and amber accents on chaotic data elements. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4.
scenes.audio_prompt: Subtle, deep hum of dormant server farms, distant, muted city ambiance.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow and majestic crane descent from a high angle, ending in a static hold.
scenes.subject_description: A vast, abstract cityscape built from glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. It features muted greys and blues, highlighted by intermittent, chaotic flashes of red, green, teal, and amber data, creating subtle glows and reflections.

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same financial data landscape from Scene 1 (A vast, abstract cityscape built from glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. It features muted greys and blues, highlighted by intermittent, chaotic flashes of red, green, teal, and amber data, creating subtle glows and reflections.).

Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4. Heavy halation bloom on digital interface elements, chromatic aberration on edge highlights. 35mm Kodak 2383 print emulation with pronounced grain structure at ISO 2500. Sensor noise visible in shadow areas. All 3D renders treated with lens breathing artifacts and subtle focus hunting to break the 'too perfect' CGI look. The same BotSpot AI bot from Scene 1, a complex, crystalline AI bot with glowing teal and amber neural pathways visible within its translucent structure, now beginning to activate and pulse from within. Its form is sleek, minimalist, with subtle chrome accents. It is prominently featured in the center 80% of the frame. Medium shot (MS), a smooth steadicam glide slowly pulling back from a close-up on the bot's activating core, gradually revealing the bot analyzing and orchestrating the previously chaotic financial data architecture surrounding it. Dramatic low-key lighting, emphasizing the internal glow of the BotSpot AI bot. Strong edge lighting creates rim separation on the bot's form. Volumetric haze highlights data streams. Heavy halation bloom on the bot's firing neural pathways and structured data interfaces. Desaturated palette with vibrant, selective teal and amber accents on the bot's active elements and organized data streams. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4.
scenes.audio_prompt: Growing, rhythmic electronic pulse as the AI activates, accompanied by subtle clicks and whirs of data processing.
scenes.motion_prompt: Smooth steadicam glide pulling back slowly, with organic micro-movements.
scenes.subject_reference: the same financial data landscape from Scene 1 (A vast, abstract cityscape built from glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. It features muted greys and blues, highlighted by intermittent, chaotic flashes of red, green, teal, and amber data, creating subtle glows and reflections.)

scenes.visual_prompt:
[CONSISTENCY CRITICAL] Feature the same financial data landscape from Scene 1 (A vast, abstract cityscape built from glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. It features muted greys and blues, highlighted by intermittent, chaotic flashes of red, green, teal, and amber data, creating subtle glows and reflections.).

Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4. Heavy halation bloom on digital interface elements, chromatic aberration on edge highlights. 35mm Kodak 2383 print emulation with pronounced grain structure at ISO 2500. Sensor noise visible in shadow areas. All 3D renders treated with lens breathing artifacts and subtle focus hunting to break the 'too perfect' CGI look. The same BotSpot AI bot from Scene 1, now fully illuminated with glowing, organized teal and amber data flowing around it, transforming the chaotic landscape into a serene, efficient network of wealth generation. The bot is perfectly centered, exuding calm intelligence, filling the frame. Close-up (CU) on the BotSpot AI bot, a subtle, almost imperceptible steadicam push-in, emphasizing the intricate details of its active neural pathways and the harmonious, organized data streams it manages. Dramatic low-key lighting, the BotSpot AI bot itself is a key practical light source, casting soft, controlled glows onto its surroundings. Volumetric haze subtly catches the light, enhancing the depth and serenity of the organized data. Heavy halation bloom on the serene, glowing UI elements and data flows. Desaturated palette, but with prominent, serene teal and amber accents now dominant and organized, representing controlled wealth. Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4.
scenes.audio_prompt: Calm, sophisticated electronic hum, with serene, flowing data chimes, overlaid with a subtle, reassuring drone.
scenes.motion_prompt: Subtle, almost imperceptible steadicam push-in, with subtle lens breathing on focus pulls.
scenes.subject_reference: the same financial data landscape from Scene 1 (A vast, abstract cityscape built from glowing financial data streams and dormant server farms, rendered with incredible detail and volumetric haze. It features muted greys and blues, highlighted by intermittent, chaotic flashes of red, green, teal, and amber data, creating subtle glows and reflections.)

strategy.visual_language: Shot on RED Komodo 6K with Zeiss Master Prime lenses at T1.4. Heavy halation bloom on digital interface elements, chromatic aberration on edge highlights. 35mm Kodak 2383 print emulation with pronounced grain structure at ISO 2500. Sensor noise visible in shadow areas. All 3D renders treated with lens breathing artifacts and subtle focus hunting to break the 'too perfect' CGI look.
strategy.narrative_arc: We open on a sleeping cityscape of financial data—dormant, chaotic, overwhelming. A single spark of AI intelligence ignites within a crystalline bot structure, its neural pathways firing to life. The bot multiplies, analyzes, executes—transforming chaos into orchestrated wealth while the world sleeps.
strategy.audience_hook: The fear of missing out on 24/7 markets while you're living your life. BotSpot becomes your tireless, intelligent proxy—working the markets so you don't have to.

cinematic_direction.mood_notes: Premium through restraint, not excess. The luxury is in precision and intelligence, not gold and glitter. Think 'Fincher meets Blade Runner 2049'—cold elegance with warm pockets of human aspiration. Desaturated palette with selective teal and amber accents on key interface moments.
cinematic_direction.lighting_notes: Dramatic low-key lighting with practical sources only. Edge lighting on 3D bot structures creating rim separation. Volumetric haze for depth. Avoid flat, even illumination—embrace deep blacks and controlled highlights with natural falloff. Halation blooms on any bright UI elements or data streams.
cinematic_direction.camera_notes: Open with static locked-off wide establishing scale. Steadicam glide through data architecture—smooth but with organic micro-movements, not robotic perfection. Crane descent for the reveal moment. All movements motivated and deliberate. Subtle lens breathing on focus pulls.

production_recommendations.voice_vibe: Authoritative whisper. Think David Attenborough meets a luxury watch commercial—measured, confident, unhurried. Low register with natural breath and subtle room tone. Not announcer-polished, but refined and knowing.

research_brief:
{
  "Product/Service Name": "BotSpot",
  "Core Value Proposition (USP)": "Empowers users to create and deploy AI-powered, automated trading bots and profitable strategies in seconds, without any coding required.",

  "Top 5 Key Features": [
    "AI Trading Agent Creation & Deployment",
    "No-code strategy building",
    "Automated trading functionality",
    "Rapid strategy development ('in seconds')",
    "24/7 market monitoring and execution"
  ],
  "Brand Tone": "Innovative, Empowering, Efficient, Accessible",
  "Industry": "FinTech, Automated Trading, AI",
  "Competitors Mentioned": "None",
  "One-Sentence Pitch": "BotSpot empowers anyone to create and deploy AI trading bots in seconds, automating profitable strategies 24/7 without needing to code."
}
